detail_desc: Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy, patterned jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.

Sleeveless dress in a crinkled, patterned weave with a V-neck front and back. Sewn-in wrapover and concealed press-stud at the front, double flounce around the neckline, ties across the back of the neck and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes. One with an all-over print.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Hooded jacket in soft, textured-knit cotton with a zip down the front that continues up and around the hood. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft pile lining.
Tailored trousers woven in a stretch cotton blend with a concealed zip in the side and fake back pocket. Straight tapered legs with creases and short slits at the hems.
Strapless top in microfibre with a light sculpting effect on the tummy and waist. Narrow, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps.

Suit trousers in a checked weave with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly with a button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with wide, adjustable, elastic shoulder straps, side support and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, organic cotton corduroy with patch front pockets, straps with adjustable buttoning, and a button at the sides. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y). Jersey lining at the top.

Long shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons at the top, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Detachable tie belt under the bust and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Oversized jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a V-neck front and back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Short parka in a cotton weave with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a pleat and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and hem, a tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.

Straight-cut blouse in an airy weave with broderie anglaise and a lace-trimmed neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back. Long sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Scalloped edges at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, tabs with adjustable buttoning at the back, and buttoned cuffs.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck at the back and short, wide sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats and a tie belt, and a straight-cut skirt with slits in the sides. Unlined.
Slightly shorter top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved shirt with a bow tie or tie and a waistcoat in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Waistcoat with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and elastication and a flounce around the neckline. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist. Unlined.
Short, straight-style T-shirt dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round, slightly wider neckline. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Suede mules with pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered wedge heels 4 cm.
5-pocket stretch cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Hoodie in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Leather sandals with wrapover straps at the front and a hook and loop tab at one side. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Leggings in soft velour with an elasticated waist.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and bottoms in soft cotton jersey. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.
Vest top in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Rib-knit hat in a double layer of soft cotton with an appliqué on the sewn-in turned-up hem.
Trousers in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend containing some linen. High waist with wide, covered elastication, and flared legs.

Short, wide dress in crinkled chiffon with a grandad collar and button placket. Long sleeves with a button at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Lined with a short, V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey in a loose fit with low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Set with a tie clip and lapel pin in metal. Length of tie clip 5.5 cm, length of lapel pin 8.5 cm.

Padded all-in-one suit in a lightly brushed, patterned weave. Faux shearling-lined hood, two concealed zips down the front with a chin guard, and elastication at the back of the waist. Foldover mitts at the cuffs and foldover feet at the hems to keep the hands and feet warm. Fleece lining. The polyester content of the suit is recycled.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline, deep armholes with raw edges, and slits in the sides.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif.
Short cotton twill skirt with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and visible seams front and back.
Soft cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit. High paper bag waist with covered elastication and a frill trim, zip fly and press-studs, side and back pockets, and tapered legs.
Short, sleeveless top in soft jersey with a draped wrapover detail at the hem.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Oversized, knee-length top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and gathered ribbing at the cuffs. Kangaroo pocket with a small embroidery detail. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist and skinny legs.
Low-necked vest top in soft linen jersey.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with a high waist and zip fly and button. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric and a pair of jersey leggings. Top with a motif, gently dropped shoulders, and ribbing at the neckline and cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Short kaftan in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, ties at the waist and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a boat neck and gathers at the sides for best fit.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and slim legs with ribbed hems.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with large patch front pockets and straight, gently tapered legs. Elasticated, drawstring waist with a wide jersey panel for best fit over the tummy.

Pile-lined hooded jacket in soft cotton jersey and a pair of trousers in fleece. Jacket with a hood that has sewn-on ears, and a concealed zip down the front with a chin guard. Trousers with wide, foldover jersey ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. V-neck at the front and seam with decorative gathers at the top, and short, wide puff sleeves with drawstring hems.
Soft viscose jersey T-shirt in a slightly wider style with a V-neck.
Baby Exclusive. Hairband in cotton jersey with a bow at the front and elastication at the back.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Fitted calf-length dress in crêpe jersey with gathers and draping at the top, long sleeves, a concealed zip in the side and slits in the sides of the hem. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ties at the hem.
Long, fitted dress in softly draping jersey with a sheen. Straight cut at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps that tie at the back, and a low cut and slit at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and decorative bow at the front. Tulle skirt with a cotton jersey underskirt.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with an all-over print and regular, elasticated waist. Side pockets, low crotch and tapered legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in scuba fabric with a low waist.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in jersey with a slight sheen. Elasticated waist and a laser-cut hem. Unlined.
Boots in imitation leather with a padded top edge, lacing at the front, zip in one side and loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Relaxed-fit shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, a welt back pocket and short, wide legs.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather and imitation suede sections, a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) and rubber soles.
Knee-length shorts in soft, washed cotton with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Fitted vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey with gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
